title: An Uncommon Affair
description: Marsh Endicott made a big mistakeHe assumed that Torey would be pleased to sell him her half share of the house they'd jointly inherited."If the girl makes a fuss," he'd said, "I'll just pay rent until the sale goes through." After all, no one in their right mind would trek from the West Coast to live in a run-down property in small-town Iowa.Torey, however, couldn't wait to take possession and make a new life for herself. And that new life certainly didn't include a ready-made housemate who was engaged to another woman!
author: Leigh Michaels
